definition: parent/one's own (flesh and blood)/relative/related/marriage/bride/close/intimate/in person/first-hand/in favor of/pro-/to kiss/(Internet slang) dear

sentences.english: Her brother-german went abroad where he was fourteen years old.
sentences.chinese: 她的嫡親兄弟在他十四歲那年出國。

sentences.english: The two men over there are his two first cousins.
sentences.chinese: 在那裏的兩個人是他的嫡親兄弟。

sentences.english: Across the way their widowed first cousin lived in a yellow house.
sentences.chinese: 住在她們對面的黃色房子裏的是她們寡居的嫡親堂妹。
